data.title: Wasser – natur.erholt
data.text:
You don't have to fly halfway around the world to experience this. Here in Baden-Württemberg, there are 36 different thermal and saltwater spas with spacious relaxation and wellness areas or sauna landscapes. Treat yourself to a break from everyday life and recharge your batteries. Whether the spa is located in the Black Forest in Upper Swabia or in the Swabian Alb - they all promise you peace and relaxation.

Whether drinking a cup of tea or taking a bath in peace: Every day, water helps us to organize our thoughts and escape the hustle and bustle. Find relaxation in a place that has been famous for thousands of years for the soothing and relaxing effects of its water. The choice is yours: whether you want to relax alone, romp in the water with the family or enjoy some time together - immerse yourself in the experience of Baden-Württemberg's spas.
